text: I guess I lost, huh... what's so surprising, Natsuki?
Really, Natsuki... it's not like there's much skill involved in this game...
I'm not particularly good at cards, or anything... I guess I just got lucky?
Do you think I'm trying to lose, Natsuki? Jeez...
I guess that's true, Natsuki... oh well!
Hm, that's a good question, Natsuki... well, ~player~? Would you like to see... more of me, ehehe~?
Jeez, Natsuki, I don't really think it matters if she's a girl... but, anyways, ~player~... do you want to see more of me, ehehe~?

You don't look so good, Natsuki. Are you sure you're okay?

This is, uhm, really starting to get embarassing... a-and, Natsuki? I'm stripping in front of ~player~! Of course I'd be nervous!
I-I guess I am a bit nervous. I'm stripping down in front of ~player~, after all...
I-I'm stripping down in front of ~player~, Natsuki! O-of course I'd be nervous!
N-no, that wouldn't do, ~player~. T-though if we're in the right time and place, I....um.
W-well, I... uh, don't really mind the... excitement, I guess...
(...if it's ~player~... I'm not sure if it's really the wrong idea...)
I-I'm sorry to keep you waiting, ~player~, but...
S-sorry to keep everyone waiting, but...
I-I guess this is going to... um, kill the excitement, a bit, but...
Now that I think about it... standing around like this isn't really that embarassing, anymore! So, perhaps I could... go all out for you, ~player~?
So, ~player~... I don't really feel embarassed anymore, standing like this in front of you. So, would you mind if I... put on a little show for you~?
So~ ~player~... are you ready to see just a bit more?
You've been waiting for this, hm?
Well, if I'm with you, ~player~, then...
This is the moment you've been waiting for, hm?
W-well, I guess if Monika's done it, I kinda have to...
Jeez, Monika... You're kinda painting me into a corner here. What else can I do but join in when you've already...
I don't want to, b-but if Monika already has...
Eh--? Monika lost?
It's about time! Jeez, Monika... Do you really have to be the best at everything?
Jeez. Monika, you're amazing at cards too...? I've already lost a bunch of times...
Heheh! Geez Monika, you're really setting a bad example for your club members.
It's a about time you got taken down another peg!
Monika again? Eheheh... I can't imagine what ~player~ thinks about you getting naked for him!
Monika again? Eheheh... Good thing ~player~'s a girl, or you'd be really embarrassed, huh?
Monika lost again? Sorry, I guess I zoned out. I'm feeling kinda weird...
I feel funny, like my words and my actions are totally in sync...
Nn-- It's like I'm seeing strange flickering stuff, people are talking funny... Like this is all a weird dream...
Heheh!! We get to see Monika looking nervous!

Ha! Monika blushing? Looking shy? Who are you and what have you done with the real Monika?

Ahaha! Just look at how excited ~player~ is getting, Monika!
You know, Monika, if you keep this up, ~player~ might get the wrong idea.
Hmph. I've never thought about how you look naked. I bet a perv like ~player~ did, though.
Is it time for some underwear? B-better you than me...
Time for some underwear!! (I'm kinda excited...!)
Urp! Ah! S-sorry, I just feel a little-- I'm fine. (Geez, I'm so light headed...)
Urp! Nn! Uh, d-don't mind me! I just choked a little... (Deep breaths...)
Urp! Ghah! S-sorry, um, b-bad joke?? (I'm so nauseous all of the sudden...)
(What's with that tone? ~player~ doesn't belong to you...)
(She's practically jumping on his dick...)
(Wow, Monika. Just suck him off already...)
Looks like you've lost, Natsuki! What's coming off, first?
Take your time, Natsuki. No one's forcing you to do anything.
Oh? You're not leaving, Natsuki?
Jeez, Natsuki. If you're just going to get mad at the rest of us for playing the game, then why stay?
Well, I guess you still have small things to take off, Natsuki... though I guess with you it's all small stuff, right?
Well, you're correct, Natsuki...
That's true...
Sure, Natsuki. What else are you trying to say?
Well, hopefully you'll get into the game more now, Natsuki!
It took you this long to get all the small stuff out of the way?
(Jeez, ~player~. If she's this annoying with the small things, how do you think she's going to react to the bigger stuff?)
Looks like you're finally getting into the real spirit of the game, Natsuki~
Oh, jeez. So, um, what are you taking off next, Natsuki?
So, Natsuki, now that your, uh, small pieces are off... what are you going to strip now?
If it helps, Natsuki, try imagining everyone else in their underwear. It'll help with the embarassment.
You know, ~player~, Natsuki has a point. You're really not going to see anything new or interesting when she takes her shirt off.
Well, Natsuki's right, ~player~. Even if she takes off her shirt, you're not going to be seeing much... so why not look at something more interesting, ehehe~
I-It's okay, Natsuki! I can totally understand why you'd be nervous...
Oh? Why so nervous, Natsuki? Is there something you're afraid of revealing to us?
Really, Natsuki, stripping like this is not that difficult. Unless, of course, you have something you're afraid to reveal to us...?
I suppose you just got unlucky, Natsuki. You could totally win, next round, though!
...hm. You know, ~player~, there's always something I've wondered about Natsuki... like, is she really a girl? I mean, she could totally pass as a effeminate boy, right?
You know, ~player~, I've always kind of wondered... is Natsuki really a girl? I mean, she could totally pass as just a really effeminate boy, right?
You're the first one naked, huh Natsuki? ...looks like you weren't as good as you thought you were~
M-Monika! Everyone can...(see your panties!)
(Pst! Monika, you're flashing everyone!)
Ah, Monika, you're--!
You're just taking off your blazer, right? Smart move, Pres--
N-no, that's the opposite of what I meant... W-wait, did...?
L-like one of those dreams where you're naked at school... (and kinda turned on...)
O-oh. Huh. Come to think of it, I've never seen you with your hair down...
What? Ugh. (Fuck you, Monika...)
Oh. Or not.
Are you sure you don't want to take your socks and shoes off separately, Natsuki?
How kind of you to finally join us, Natsuki.
I'm kind of surprised, ~player~. Don't you think Natsuki would have joined us sooner?
S-sure, Natsuki, whatever you say...
Sure, sure, Natsuki. That's, uh... definitely the case. Yep...
Just keep telling yourself that, Natsuki.
A-and now you're (flashing) us again...
Monika, if this were a manga, you could probably just get away with the first panty flash...
(I said that, but... she's showing her panties again. That can't be an accident...)
See? It's easier than you'd think, Natsuki.
Just the blazer, huh? Well, if you're not up to taking bigger steps, Natsuki, I totally understand!
Really, Natsuki... why so defensive? It's just your blazer. I mean... ~player~ isn't seeing you shirtless, like me.
...and I'm pretty sure ~player~ knows what a synonym is already.
Honestly, Natsuki, I think ~player~ is intelligent enough to not need a lesson in what synonyms are...
...Natsuki, I'm pretty sure we don't need you to teach us what synonyms are.
Huh...? (She's avoiding ~player~'s eyes...)
Huh...? Y-you're avoiding ~player~'s eyes... Y-you're not afraid that he...
Huh...? Y-you're avoiding ~player~'s eyes... Y-you're not afraid that she...
Heheh... Don't tell me that you're afraid of ~player~ seeing...
What a pervert, right? I bet ~player~ only joined the club to be with cute girls, like he's in some gross dating sim.
What a pervert, right? I mean, he's the one that broke up our... wait a second, ~player~'s a girl...
S-so pervy of him. He's pretty much a total scumbag. He only joined our club because--
S-so pervy of her. She's pretty much a total dyke. She only joined our club because--
He's a dangerous pervert after all. Did you know he lifted up my skirt when nobody was--
She's totally in the closet. In fact, once she even lifted up my skirt and--
That seems like a pretty smart move, Natsuki.
Wow, Natsuki. I didn't realize your shirt was that big on you...
I guess Natsuki's shirt being too big for her makes sense, right ~player~?
I-I really didn't need to know that, Natsuki...
So if you have those styles, Natsuki... why'd you keep these?
I'm sure you have all sorts of stuff back home, Natsuki. No need to try and convince me.
Oh, M-monika's taking off her...
(If Monika went after ~player~ seriously, I don't think I would stand a chance...)
H-huh? Oh no, it's Monika's--
Oh, yeah. You're the first one to lose this badly, aren't you?
Yes, sometimes shorter poems can be more effective. What's your point?
...Honestly, Natsuki. Will you please get to the point, already? Or just stop stalling...
...honestly, Natsuki. Please stop stalling. It doesn't really help you that much.
Y-you know, this whole thing is pretty weird... but it's fun to beat Monika at something!
W-wow, sorry you lost Monika. I guess time for you to reveal your "true self" huh?
Jeez. I bet you're going to have gotten some fancy wax instead of having to just shave it yourself...
R-really, Natsuki, I get this is embarassing, but... you don't need to look so mortified, I think...
...and-- wait. Oh, jeez, is she inspecting her-- A-and what's with that horrified look on her face? N-Natsuki, do you have something to tell us?!
So I guess we're about to-- wait. N-Natsuki, are you inspecting your-- A-and what's with that... horrified look on your face? A-are you about to reveal something to us, Natsuki?!
But don't worry, Natsuki! I'm sure you'll get better for the last round... somehow. Hopefully.
Just let me take these off... Hm? What was that, Natsuki?
Give me a second to take these off... huh? Sorry, Natsuki, are you trying to say something?
I'm just going to slip these off and... hm? Natsuki? Were you trying to say something?
Ju~st let me get these things off for you, ~player~~!

A-anyways, I-I guess I should take my shirt off...
A-anyways... I-I think I should remove my shirt, next...
A-anyways... my shirt should be next, I think...
...wait, what? When did this happen?!
...give him more credit than that, Natsuki.
...give her more credit than that, Natsuki.
--because it was full of cute girls, Natsuki? ...well, I mean... he's not wrong.
--because it was full of cute girls, Natsuki? ...so? I mean... she's not wrong, right?

Ahaha~ sorry, sorry!
Ehehe~ sorry, Natsuki. On the other hand... well, I think you'll like this, ~player~...
Well... here~ I~ go~!
And... off comes the bra~!
You were waiting to see these, weren't you~?
Well, here goes nothing!
I guess you're about to see me. All of me.
Just let me slip this off for you~
R-right in front of ~player~ too...

And to add insult to injury, she has this hot "bedroom" look to her now, with her hair down...

Well, you're no fun, Natsuki...

(Sheesh. I think Natsuki might get even grumpier now that her small stuff is gone...)

...Doing it again kind of... I dunno, this seems a little... out of character for you. You're not usually this slut-- Eep!!
I dunno, this seems a little... slutty for you. (W-wait, what did I just...)

...thanks for the friendly reminder though, I guess?

...are you going to try teaching us any more grade-school concepts, Natsuki?
(I-is she into ~player~!?)
... (That bitch...!)

...um. (Should I tell her?)

Oh...
(Sh-she's openly flirting with ~player~ now...)

Hahah! I'm better than you at something, Monika! H-huh? W-wait the forfeit is...!?
Ha! Not so perfect now!
Oh, jeez. Are you sure you're really up for the forfeit, Natsuki?
Jeez... you really did badly during the game, Natsuki. I mean, you're already out, and I've still got most of my clothes on...

It looks like it's your turn to go at it, Natsuki!

I-is this... does this look weird to anyone else??
I get to watch her finger that perfect little... Ehehe, I guess I can get a bit pervy too... B-but this is mostly me being a horrible person, n-not gay. (Wait. Fuck.)

(J-just treat this like a... a normal Literature Club activity, Monika...)

Ehehe... I bet you're imagining me making those cute little noises together with Natsuki, hm...?
(Eyes on the cards, Monika...)
(Eyes on the cards, ~player~...)

J-just a normal-- ah!-- L-Literature Club activity, r-right ~player~? Ehehe...

I-I guess this is c-club bonding, r-right, ~player~? O-oh!

D-do you have to be so... um, v-vocal, Natsuki? H-honestly...
R-really, Natsuki, do you have to be so-- uhm, loud? It's really distracting!

(Just... keep your mind on the game, Monika, and not on... those sounds...)
You don't need to worry, Natsuki! It's nothing!
Eh? What weirdness? Are you sure you're okay, Natsuki?
Oh, jeez. I was doing all of that in front of Natsuki... she's never going to let me live this down, huh?
Oh, jeez, Natsuki saw me do all of that, huh... she's never going to let me live this down...

H-hey, Monika, now that you're done, I don't suppose you mind, nn-- just, stopping whatever weirdness you're causing?
